resources.string: Your wallet was reset!\nIt will take some time to recover.
There is no web browser installed to open the external document.
No suitable cloud storage provider is installed.\nYou need something like \"Nextcloud\" or \"Google Drive\".
Use at your own risk. Read the <u>safety notes</u>.
You need to <u>back up your wallet</u>!
Problem with synchronization: Low storage space
Problem with synchronization: No network connectivity
To protect your privacy, your address will change once it receives a payment.
Your device is old and insecure. Please only use for small amounts.
This amount is quite high for carrying in your pocket. Please move some to a safer place.
View current exchange rates for Dogecoin

How to get Dogecoins?
Trade for traditional money,
sell goods or services or
earn by working.
Tip: This wallet works best if you don’t use it for lots of tiny transactions. Too many small inputs can slow things down and make your coins take longer to show up.
Please back up your wallet\nbefore receiving any Dogecoins!
Congratulations, you received your first payment! Have you already <u>backed up your wallet</u>, to protect against loss?
Hint: to increase the safety of your wallet, you can <u>encrypt your device</u>. This also protects data of other apps.
The Dogecoin network is undergoing maintenance. You\'re advised to not send or receive any coins until maintenance is finished. <u>More information.</u>

Your device\'s Bluetooth component is vulnerable. Your Dogecoins on this device are at risk, regardless of the app you\'re using to store them!\n\nWe suggest to switch off Bluetooth immediately and check with your device manufacturer for an Android OS update that implements security patch level \'%s\' or later.

Dogecoin Wallet uses internal storage for remembering transactions and blocks. If it runs out of space, it will stop working and your Dogecoins will be at risk!\n\nDo you want to open the Application Manager to uninstall unneeded apps?
Your device time is off by %d minutes. You probably cannot send or receive Dogecoins due to this problem.\n\nYou should check and if necessary correct your date, time and timezone settings.
This version fixes important bugs. For details, see the change log on %s.
If you don\'t see an update, this probably means your version of Android isn\'t supported any more.
Android version is out of date

Chances are that one of the next releases of Dogecoin Wallet will not support your device any more. In some cases, it can get difficult to spend coins on this device.\n\nUnless you know what you are doing, it is recommended to move out your coins soon.
The payee (%1$s) is using an incompatible payment protocol (reason: %2$s).
You\'re about to send to yourself!
An economic fee of %s will be paid. Important: Use \'economic\' only if you don\'t care about confirmation time.
A network fee of %s will be paid.
A priority fee of %s will be paid. If you care about low fees, use \'priority\' only if you need confirmation as soon as possible.
The amount is too small to send.
Not enough available coins. You\'re missing %s. This may also be due to the network fee.
The amount of tiny payments in your wallet doesn\'t add up to a sendable value.
Currently payments are not possible because a replay is in progress.
Send payment directly to the payee.
Your payment was successfully sent directly.
Your payment was rejected via direct connection.
Your payment will still be broadcasted via the P2P network.
The network fee for this payment (%1$s) is high in relation to the amount (%2$s). Do you want to send anyway?
Do you want to pay with all you have?
Do you want to raise the network fee of this payment by %s? It will make the payment confirm quicker.
The network fee of this payment can\'t be raised.

You are about to sweep a paper wallet or coupon. This will move all coins from that paper to your wallet on this device. When the transaction is confirmed, the paper will be worthless and should not be re-used for safety reasons.

Paper wallets are most commonly used for cold storage. Some ATMs print them on their paper slip rather than sending the coins to your mobile device directly. People sometimes use pre-charged paper wallets to pass value around (not recommended).
Start by scanning the private key of a paper wallet. Use the camera action button.
This private key is protected with a password.
You\'ve got a bad connection to the Electrum network.
The amount of coins in the wallet is too small for sweeping.
You received %1$s to unsecure addresses. Would you like to move these coins to secure addresses? A small network fee of %2$s will be paid.
Accept payment via Bluetooth for more reliable processing
Have this code scanned by the sender.
Or tap an NFC enabled device.
The scanned address is your own.
This is your current address for receiving.
This address might be compromised. You should not use it any more for receiving coins.
This payment has not been transmitted yet.
Your payment was successfully sent using RadioDoge. It should reached the payee.
This payment has been credited to your wallet.
Your payment was successful. It has reached the payee.
This transaction strengthens your wallet against theft. <u>More info.</u>
This transaction raises the network fee for a previous payment.
This payment has been received directly. There is a risk it might never become spendable.
The confirmation of this payment is delayed, likely due to an overload of the Dogecoin network.
This payment should become spendable in a few minutes.
Due to maintenance on the Dogecoin network, this transaction should not be trusted until it is fully confirmed.
This payment has an increased risk of being reversed by the sender! If you can, wait for confirmation.
This payment has been reversed by the sender.
This small amount can probably never be spent economically.
This payment pays to many wallets besides yours, which makes the app slow down over time. If you can, try receiving payments which pay only to you.
This payment was delayed because the sender used an insecure transaction type.
Monitor network status and peer connections
You are about to replace your current wallet. Any coins in the current wallet will be lost unless you\'ve got a separate backup of that.
Important: Do not load private keys from dubious sources! Others can gain control over your funds if you do.
Your wallet was successfully restored. Its balance will be determined next. This will take some time.
Warning: Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Make sure you still remember it before you receive to this wallet.

Wallet could not be restored:

%s

Bad password?
Your backup will be encrypted with the chosen password and written to external storage.
Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Make sure you remember the PIN in addition to the backup password!

Your wallet has been backed up to %s

If the only place your backup exists is on your device, you run the risk of losing both at the same time!

In any case, make sure you remember your backup password.
Your wallet could not be backed up:\n%s
Spending from your wallet will be protected with the chosen PIN.
Important: You need to remember your PIN! Do not use common numbers (like birthdates).
The camera has a problem. You probably need to restart the device.
In order to scan QR codes, you need to grant permission to use the camera.
Got invalid dogecoin address!\n(Mixing up mainnet/testnet?)
Unit to show amounts in. This does not affect computations.
Your name or your company\'s name, to be added to payment requests you issue to your customers.
When the payment is made, the send dialog will close automatically.
Choose the default fee category for new transactions. ECONOMIC uses Dogecoin recommendation (0.01 DOGE/KB).
Choose between low data usage and improved privacy when synchronizing with the network.
Low data usage: Use network filtering to read only transactions relevant to your wallet. It will use about 500 MB per month, but will disclose the filter to the network.

Improved privacy: Will not disclose any information about your wallet to the network. Be aware that because all transactions are read, this will use a hefty 10 GB per month. Before using this please check your data allowance.
IP or hostname of single peer to connect to.
Please enter a valid IP address or hostname. If you have Tor set up, you can use an onion address here, too.
You can specify multiple trusted peers by separating them with a space character.
Prevents connecting to any peers besides the trusted peer.
External block explorer to use for browsing transactions, addresses and blocks.
Show options to restrict data usage on mobile networks.
Show options to disable or enable specific notifications.
After a couple of weeks of not being used, the app will notify if there are still coins in the wallet.
Have you really read the safety notes? Did you already back up your wallet to a safe place?
Manually configure your own Bluetooth address so you can receive payments from payers without connectivity.

Unfortunately Android is preventing the automatic detection of your device\'s Bluetooth address. You need to look it up in the Android Bluetooth settings and enter it here.\n\nPlease make sure that every character is correct. Colons can be omitted, and case is not important.
Use RadioDoge to broadcast transactions when no internet connection is available
Show map of stores that accept Dogecoin
Enable detailed logging for debugging. Logs are stored in app files and may grow large if enabled.
Enable product catalog and web-based POS system for merchants
Using RadioDoge for payments without Internet
Secure payment terminal for POS systems
Enter a PIN code to protect terminal mode. You will need this PIN to exit terminal mode.
Enter your PIN to exit terminal mode
PIN is required to activate terminal mode
Do you want to activate Payment Terminal Mode? You will need to set a PIN if not already set.
Reset block chain, transactions and wallet balance. Replay will take a while, so only do this if you know why.

Would you like to reset and replay the block chain?\n\nThis will temporarily hide your wallet balance and remove transactions. Both will recover as block chain sync progresses. Make sure you\'ve got a reliable connection to the internet.
View the extended public key of your wallet, so it can be imported into other apps and services. Be careful: doing so will disclose your monetary privacy to that app.
Please describe your issue precisely enough to be reproduced. Use English language if you can.
Would you like to send a crash report, helping to fix this issue in the future?
Guava, a collection of useful helpers
Frequently asked questions about the app
You\'ve still got Dogecoins on this device!
Remember your balance of %s will be lost if you uninstall the Dogecoin Wallet app without sending it away first.
If you don\'t care about your coins, you could also donate them to the Dogecoin Wallet project.
Ready to receive payments via Bluetooth
Scan the QR code with the derived key to activate child mode
Enter the parent PIN to access Safety and Settings
Add a child to get started
Use your fingerprint or face to unlock the wallet
Biometric authentication is not available on this device
Too many failed attempts. Try again later
Create an encrypted backup of your wallet to protect against loss or device failure. Essential for wallet recovery.
Restore your wallet from a previously created backup file. Useful when setting up on a new device or recovering from issues.
Important safety guidelines and best practices for securely using your Dogecoin wallet. Read before storing significant amounts.
Technical documentation about the wallet\'s architecture, features, and implementation details for advanced users.
Report bugs or issues with the wallet
App version, license, and developer information
Enter original text or file hash:
Are you sure you want to delete this recurring payment?
No private key available for signing
Are you sure you want to deactivate child mode? This will revert the wallet to normal mode and remove the derived key.
Enter a PIN code to protect access to Safety and Settings when child mode is active.
This will prevent this address from being used in regular payments and recurring payments. The coins in this address will be reserved and not included in your available balance. Continue?
This will allow this address to be used in regular payments and recurring payments again. The coins in this address will be included in your available balance. Continue?
No transactions found for selected date range
Choose how you would like to set up your wallet:
Create a new wallet and generate a new seed phrase
Restore an existing wallet from backup or seed phrase
Activate a child wallet using a QR code from Family Mode
For your security, you must create a backup of your new wallet before you can use it. This backup will allow you to restore your wallet if you lose your device.
Wallet backup created successfully! You can now use your wallet.
Everything you need to know about Dogecoin, blockchain technology, and this wallet
Self-Custody: You control your private keys, not a third party
Privacy: No personal information required, anonymous transactions
Family Mode: Teach kids about money with controlled access
Offline Capable: Works without internet for basic functions using RadioDoge
Open Source: Transparent code that anyone can verify
Decentralized: No single authority controls it
Fast: Transactions complete in minutes, not days
Low Fees: Send money globally for pennies
Global: Works the same everywhere in the world
Transparent: All transactions are public and verifiable
Cheap: Very low fees compared to traditional banks
A blockchain is like a digital ledger that records all transactions
It works by linking blocks of transactions together in a chain
Each block contains many transactions and is verified by miners
Consensus: Everyone agrees on which transactions are valid
Immutable: Once recorded, transactions cannot be changed
Distributed: Thousands of computers keep a copy of the blockchain
Secure: Advanced encryption protects all transactions
SPV vs Full Node: Why This Wallet Uses SPV
SPV (Simplified Payment Verification) is a lightweight way to use Bitcoin/Dogecoin
Full Node: Downloads entire blockchain (100+ GB), SPV: Only downloads block headers (~50 MB)
SPV (Simplified Payment Verification): Verifies only relevant transactions
Full Node: Downloads and verifies the entire blockchain
Why SPV: Faster, uses less space and battery on your phone
Trust: SPV trusts full nodes for verification
Balance: SPV is perfect for mobile wallets
SPV Advantages: Faster setup, less storage, less bandwidth, mobile-friendly
SPV works by trusting miners to verify transactions, while still maintaining security
Security: SPV is secure for normal users, full nodes are needed for merchants
Mining is the process of verifying transactions and adding them to the blockchain
Miners solve complex math problems to create new blocks
Rewards: Miners earn new Dogecoins and transaction fees for their work
Difficulty: The math problems get harder as more miners join
Energy: Mining uses electricity, but it secures the network
Reward: Miners receive Dogecoin for each block mined
Network: Miners keep the Dogecoin network secure and running
A Dogecoin address is like your bank account number, but for Dogecoin
Addresses are generated from your private key using cryptography
Sub-addresses: Family Mode creates separate addresses for each child
New Addresses: Each payment gets a fresh address for better privacy
Privacy: Using different addresses makes it harder to track your spending
Family Mode: Teaching Kids About Money
Family Mode lets parents create controlled wallets for their children
Parents can set spending limits and monitor their children\'s transactions
Benefits: Teaches financial responsibility in a safe, controlled environment
Safety: Children can\'t access the main wallet or send money without permission
Teaching: Kids learn about digital money, saving, and spending responsibly
Private Keys: Never share your private keys with anyone
Backup: Always backup your wallet and store it safely
Biometric: Use fingerprint or face recognition for extra security
Encryption: Your wallet is encrypted with a password you choose
Best Practices: Use strong passwords, keep software updated, be cautious of scams
Start Small: Begin with small amounts to learn how it works
Learn Gradually: Take your time to understand each feature
Community: Join Dogecoin communities to learn from others
Stay Updated: Keep your wallet updated for security and new features
Have Fun: Dogecoin is about having fun while learning about the future of money!
RadioDoge is a revolutionary way to send Dogecoin without internet connection
It uses radio waves to broadcast transactions across long distances
Benefits: Works in remote areas, disaster zones, and places without internet
Global Reach: Connect with people worldwide, even in the most remote locations
Future of Money: RadioDoge represents the future of decentralized communication
Purpose: Dogecoin is not about getting rich, it\'s about empowering people
Real Money: Designed to be used as conventional money, not speculation
Unbanked Support: Helps people without bank accounts access financial services
Global Access: Provides financial freedom to people worldwide
Community First: Built by the community, for the community
Transaction Fees: Why Do We Pay Fees?
What are fees? Small amounts of Dogecoin paid to miners who process your transaction
Why needed? Miners use computers and electricity to secure the network and verify transactions
How much? Dogecoin fees are very low: about 0.01 DOGE per KB (typically 0.0025-0.01 DOGE per transaction)
Examples: Small payment (~250 bytes) = ~0.0025 DOGE, Medium (~500 bytes) = ~0.005 DOGE, Large (~1000 bytes) = ~0.01 DOGE
Why so cheap? Dogecoin fees are much lower than banks or other cryptocurrencies, making it perfect for everyday use
Show or hide the Family Mode menu option
Show or hide the Recurring Payments menu option
Show or hide the Digital Signature menu option
Show or hide the Write a Check menu option
Select date when check can be spent
Date must be in the future
Expiration date must be after locktime date
Are you sure you want to cancel this check? Funds will be returned to your wallet.
Show or hide the Multi-Sig menu option
Create and manage multi-signature wallets. Share control with others for enhanced security.
Generate your public key to share with other signers. They\'ll need this to create the multi-sig wallet together.
Combine public keys from all signers to create a shared wallet. For example, \"2 of 3\" means 2 signatures are required from 3 total keys.
Send funds to the multi-sig address or spend from it. Spending requires signatures from the required number of signers.
Please generate a public key first
Enter how many signatures are required and the total number of keys. Then add all public keys from each signer. You can scan QR codes or paste them manually.
This is a %1$d-of-%2$d multi-signature wallet. Address: %3$s\n\nShare this address to receive funds. To spend, you\'ll need %1$d signatures from the %2$d key holders.
Create a transaction that needs to be signed by multiple parties. Enter the destination address and amount, then share the unsigned transaction with other signers.
Paste or scan an unsigned transaction hex. The app will sign it with your key. Share the signed transaction with other signers until you have enough signatures.
Combine multiple signatures into a complete transaction. Paste the transaction hex and all signatures, then broadcast when you have enough signatures.
Unable to generate key from wallet
Please create a multisig wallet first
Required signatures must be between 1 and total keys
All public keys must be provided
No UTXOs found for multisig address
Unable to get key for signing
Show or hide the Authentication menu option
Prove you have access to a ticket, digital content, or doors by signing with your wallet
Scan the QR code to automatically sign the message
Share this signature as a QR code or text to prove access
Paste or type the message, hash, or text to sign...
Enter message to sign (string, hash, or text)
Please select or generate an address first.
Please enter a message to sign.
Are you sure you want to delete this authentication request?
Buy or sell Dogecoin using Metal Pay Connect
Unable to connect to exchange service
The server is missing API keys. Please contact the server administrator to configure SECRET_KEY and API_KEY environment variables.
This is a server configuration error. The Exchange API server may be missing required API keys or has a configuration issue. Please check the server settings or contact support.
Failed to load Metal Pay Connect SDK
The SDK could not be loaded from any source. Please check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, the SDK may need to be bundled with the app.
Configure the Exchange API server URL
Enter the Exchange API host URL (e.g., https://api.dogecoinwallet.org)
Enable experimental exchange feature to buy or sell Dogecoin using Metal Pay Connect
Enable experimental atomic swap feature for cross-chain swaps (DOGE ↔ BTC, DOGE ↔ LTC)
Atomic Swap is an experimental feature. Use at your own risk.
